desc: At Northern Grips, we believe in safer walking in winter. Millions of people experience slip & fall accidents on icy streets every year. Our unique winter grip is discreet, good for indoors, and always ready to improve your shoe traction on ice. Preventing a single serious injury makes a difference. Help with us.

layout.text: Improve your safety. Preserve your style.
We believe in more convenient and versatile solutions to prevent slip and fall accidents.
